name: Art at the Park Appleton
description: The fair draws ~20,000 visitors and features art, crafts, and food — a high-traffic crowd likely to appreciate a fun cat-themed coffee/baked-goods truck.

name: Mile of Music 2025 (Mile 12)
location: Downtown Appleton, College Ave & various venues
description: A big music festival with lots of foot traffic across downtown — fans enjoying music might love grabbing coffee or treats between sets.

name: Food Truck Fest
description: Dedicated food-truck event: perfect environment for a specialty coffee + baked-goods + cat-themed truck.

name: Light the Night Market
location: Downtown Appleton / College Avenue + Houdini Plaza
description: Experience the magic of Light the Night Market as we illuminate Downtown Appleton with an enchanting open-air event. This year, the night market embraces a renaissance flair with thrilling elements such as LARP, pirate ship ride, maypole dancing, and more!

name: Downtown Appleton Farm Market
description: Visit 100+ local vendors along College Avenue selling locally grown produce, handcrafted items, baked goods, flowers, hot food, coffee, meats and cheese, and so more!

name: 7th Annual Fox Cities Kidz Expo
location: Fox Cities Exhibition Center, Downtown Appleton
description: Family-oriented expo with 60+ booths and many kids/families — good opportunity for baked goods, warm drinks, and cat-themed appeal for families & children.
